revised_title: Botanical Results of Agricultural Experiments on Permanent Meadow
tldr: This article presents the botanical results of over 20 years of agricultural experiments on permanent meadow, focusing on the effects of various manures and climatic conditions on the growth and composition of the mixed herbage. The authors describe the normal botanical composition of the herbage and the changes induced by different manuring agents and seasonal variations, providing insights into the competitive dynamics among plant species in the meadow.
